action--e6b8f7b1-f2ba-4bae-bf85-05fb813c.description: Terminate any suspicious processes that were spawned by unauthorized script execution.

decision--5332bae7-23bf-4f89-b77e-28dc0f.description: Decide whether the affected host-22 needs to be isolated from the network.

action--5332bae7-23bf-4f89-b77e-28dc0fad.name: Isolate Affected Host-22
action--5332bae7-23bf-4f89-b77e-28dc0fad.description: Disconnect host-22 from the network to prevent lateral movement.
